author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Pretty much all of that. We have sync test which check that one node can sync from another, transaction tests that execute different transactions/smart contracts, devp2p tests that test the networking layer. These tests are executed on each new version of the different clients, see https://github.com/ethereum/hive Additionally each client team writes their own tests for their own implementation
